title: .webp
description: The `.webp` is an image format developed by Google that provides both lossy and lossless compression for images, offering smaller file sizes with similar quality to `.jpeg` and `.png`.
content: The image format designed by Google that offers both lossy and lossless compression, providing smaller file sizes with similar quality to `.jpeg` and `.png` while maintaining high image quality. It supports transparency and is often used for web images.
